newsitem.title: FRANCE: France's Borotra receives Thomson unions.
newsitem.headline: France's Borotra receives Thomson unions.

text.p: French Industry Minister Franck Borotra on Friday met a trade union delegation from Thomson SA which wants the government to stop the privatisation of the electronics group.

"Franck Borotra had expressed the government's intention to pursue the privatisation (of Thomson) according to the terms that will be detailed in the coming days," the industry ministry said in a statement.
"He has taken note of comments that TMM (Thomson Multimedia) should be fully valued and reconfirmed the recapitalisation of this company," the statement said.
The worker representatives are due to be received at Prime Minister Alain Juppe's office later today. Juppe himself is in Bordeaux, where he is mayor.
Government sources said that it was unclear what the next steps in the sale would be and when it would be announced.
"I believe we need a few days to think things over," an official said.
